description.value:
You spot anything out of place in the areas you know best. While in your @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Favored Terrain]{Favored Terrain}, you always gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Scout]{Scout} exploration activity, even if you are performing another exploration activity.

If you're legendary in Survival, you gain these benefits in any terrain.
